name: Circuler Transection
spec: %m.view Convert this Linear As Circuler Translation When Revealed

name: translation Effect
code:
LinearLayout viewgroup =(LinearLayout) %1$s;

android.transition.AutoTransition autoTransition = new android.transition.AutoTransition(); autoTransition.setDuration((long)%2$s); android.transition.TransitionManager.beginDelayedTransition(viewgroup, autoTransition);
